name: Factory AI
description: Agent-native software development company building autonomous AI Droids that automate the software development lifecycle, saving enterprises over 500,000 engineering hours.

zh-Hans.description: 智能体原生软件开发公司,构建自主 AI Droids 自动化软件开发生命周期,为企业节省超过 50 万工程小时。

de.description: Agentenbasiertes Softwareentwicklungsunternehmen, das autonome KI-Droids entwickelt, die den Software-Entwicklungslebenszyklus automatisieren.
